description:
计算机图形课的小项目
It's a computer graphics course project.

鼠标跟踪光源
Real-time rendered triangles with light source at the cursor.

The triangles are generated randomly.

Resolution    1920x1080
Framerate    24 fps
CPU usage   2%~3% on i7-4790k

* 交互菜单尚未做完
* Interactive menu is under development

See JavaScript code at my Github - github.com/JCBreath/WebLowPolyRendering

Enjoy.
title: TrianglesBackground - 三角壁纸
